properties.title: Site
properties.description: Settings directly related to the internals of the site

properties.title: title
properties.description: Name of the site

properties.title: Domain
properties.description: Domain of this website

properties.title: Description
properties.description: Simple description of the site

properties.title: Logo
properties.description: Logo for thumbnails, browser tabs and used on phones

properties.title: Theme
properties.description: Theme and design settings applied to the entire site

properties.title: Theme
properties.description: Design and presentation layer for your site

properties.title: Banner
properties.description: Banner image aplied to themes that implement one

properties.title: Accent color
properties.description: Accent color applied to themes that implement it

properties.title: Icon
properties.description: Icon to represent the site in themes that implement it

properties.title: SEO
properties.description: Search engine and detailed internal path handling

properties.title: Pathauto
properties.description: Automatically maintain and update page paths

properties.title: Hide unpublished pages
properties.description: Check the box to hide unpublished pages

properties.title: Add service worker to dynamic page
properties.description: Whether or not add the service worker to the .php version. Disable this if you need users to see changes instantly.

properties.title: Force browser upgrade
properties.description: Force users viewing the site to have evergreen browsers (not recommended)

properties.title: Author
properties.description: Tell us about you and the site you are making

properties.title: License
properties.description: The source url for the element this is citing.

properties.title: Image
properties.description: Photo

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Name

properties.title: Email
properties.description: email address

properties.title: Social media link
properties.description: A primary social space / point of contact

properties.title: Publishing
properties.description: Publishing options

properties.title: CDN
properties.description: CDN to use for published assets

properties.title: Offline
properties.description: Published site will work when completely offline

properties.title: Version control
properties.description: Store relational data about fields

properties.title: Default branch
properties.description: Branch to publish on (master is common)

properties.title: Static branch
properties.description: Branch to publish on (gh-pages is common)

properties.title: Git url
properties.description: location of the git repository to sync up to

properties.title: Auto push on save
properties.description: Push code to the associated remote repo whenever any change is made

properties.title: Vendor
properties.description: Vendor used for internal publishing flexibility

properties.title: Public repo address
properties.description: URL with path to where the files of this site are publicly accessible. This is useful for having people contribute to the source backing your site. Example: https://github.com/{you}/{repoName}/tree/master/

properties.title: Fields
properties.description: Custom fields for nodes in the site

properties.title: Custom Fields
properties.description: Store relational data about nodes and other properties

properties.title: Input method
properties.description: How users can enter data for this field

properties.title: Machine name
properties.description: Field machine name for storage

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Readable name of the field

properties.title: Description
properties.description: additional details about the field data

properties.title: Required
properties.description: Is this field required

properties.title: Icon
properties.description: Optional icon to represent this field

static.publishacopy:
Publish a copy

This will publish your site, overwriting the previous copy living in your "published" storage location.

Publish

git.dangerzone:
Danger zone

This will sync the local copy of the site with the git repository is backing it

Sync git origin

This wil revert the git history powering the site by 1 commit. This is a destructive command, only use this if you just saved something you didn't mean to.

Revert last commit
